title: Chinese Bonds Bounce Back on Bank Demand, Pullback in Equities
description: Chinese banks are deploying excess cash into the bond market, fueling a recovery just as a cooling stock rally draws investors back to government debt.
content: Chinese banks are deploying excess cash into the bond market, fueling a recovery just as a cooling stock rally draws investors back to government debt.
